overview: Bob Citelli heads @Sales & Marketing, an independent resource for Internet centric, start ups and early stages companies seeking sophisticated services to build brands by identifying and implementing strategic alliances and third-party partnerships as well as coordinating corporate marketing, public relations and advertising programs. The @Sales & Marketing team is comprised of successful serial entrepreneurs, hands-on experts who willl drive your business forward with timely and measurable strategic consulting and tactical results. the Company provides senior management expertise, contacts and qualifications.
